fields.request: Manual QA: Verify node profile metadata for automation
fields.request_details: In the Django admin go to Nodes â†’ Node profiles and add a profile named "QA Terminal" with data `{"timezone": "UTC", "asset_tag": "QA-100"}`. Edit a node and assign the new profile, then run `python manage.py shell -c "from core.sigil_context import set_context, clear_context; from core.sigil_resolver import resolve_sigils; from nodes.ansible import render_inventory_host; from nodes.models import Node; node = Node.objects.filter(profile__isnull=False).first(); assert node, 'Assign the QA profile to a node first.'; host = render_inventory_host(node); vars = host['vars']; assert vars['node_profile_name'] == 'QA Terminal'; assert vars['node_profile']['timezone'] == 'UTC'; set_context({Node: node.pk}); try: assert resolve_sigils('[NODE.PROFILE.TIMEZONE]') == 'UTC'; assert resolve_sigils('[NODE.ASSET_TAG]') == 'QA-100'; finally: clear_context()"` to confirm the profile data feeds inventory and sigil resolution.
